result.reason: The startup reconnect flow currently only reopens persisted tree nodes and does not persist enough data to rehydrate open Quick Connect sessions.
result.approach: Persist metadata for open Quick Connect sessions on shutdown and extend startup reconnect logic to recreate and open those quick sessions alongside normal saved connections.
